Files Headings

maxLength.json

 
[
    {
        "description": "maxLength validation",
        "schema": {"maxLength": 2},
        "tests": [
            {
                "description": "shorter is valid",
                "data": "f",
                "valid": true
            },
            {
                "description": "exact length is valid",
                "data": "fo",
                "valid": true
            },
            {
                "description": "too long is invalid",
                "data": "foo",
                "valid": false
            },
            {
                "description": "ignores non-strings",
                "data": 100,
                "valid": true
            }
        ]
    }
]
